t: Ads Against AIDS
s: February 17, 2003 - Have we ever been eaten by a shark?” And so they both make the jump. Then the tag, “Stop making excuses. Always use protection,” and a final, Jaws-style shot of bloody water. “South Park humor,” as the ad’s creator, Michael Franzini, describes it, meets the AIDS-awareness campaign.
